chainless double_crochet video first chain yo pull through all loops on hook chainless double_crochet aureole mandala a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 2 of 21 symbol guide asterisks * to repeat instructions after a single asterisk as directed example *single_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain-1 space chain 1 skip next fpdc repeat from * around parentheses indicates a group of sts that are worked together in or around the same st i also use parentheses to indicate the name of sts skipped example #1 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space example #2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet chain-1 space 2 half_double_crochet brackets repeat instructions within brackets as directed example double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip treble_crochet 2 times count totals total chain spaces are included in the st count corner chain spaces are not included in the total example counts 48 double_crochet 36 fptr 8 chain-2 space 4 chain-2 corner space 100 total/25 per side special instructions instructions for all rounds start with a standing stitch and end with an invisible join to 2nd st of round and fasten_off if not changing colors you
